title: Sarah Richardson Seven River Gold Vermeil Necklace
description:
The 7 River Gold Necklace river stones are hand carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver, then plated in heavy 18K gold. Each piece is then finished with a high polished edge. The support is 18K gold over gold fill chain. Sarah Richardson’s jewelry ranges from everyday simple to extraordinary. The organic nature of her jewelry finds balance and symmetry through repetition. Each piece is finely crafted in California using traditional metalsmithing techniques in precious metals.

River stones vary in size, up to 0.33 in. W. Chain is adjustable, 16-18 in. L.
